hero.briefIntro: Quark has the largest number of on-chain holders and is a groundbreaking and important project in the Atomicals ecosystem.

features.title: Atomicals
features.text: Atomicals is an outstanding protocol, with Quark being one of its representative tokens.

features.title: 22K+ Holders
features.text: Quark has a robust community of nearly 22K+ holders.

features.title: Colored Coins
features.text: Colored coins represent the trend of token issuance within the Bitcoin ecosystem.

features.title: Physics Meme
features.text: It's iconic in Atomicals Protocol narratives, akin to a physics meme.

testimonials.name: Atomicals Protocol
testimonials.text: Atomicals are the world's first Bitcoin Overlay Protocol on #Bitcoin backed by the native fungible Satoshi and UTXO model. Mr. Hal Finney made this prescient post from 2010 to say this which is the entire basis of #Atomicals Protocol Theory. The #ARC20 token standard is the ultimate solution of the Bitcoin Colored Coins experiments of the past decade.

testimonials.name: OKX
testimonials.text: ARC-20 introduces a fungible token standard to the Bitcoin blockchain, using satoshis — the smallest units of Bitcoin — as the backbone for token representation. This means each ARC-20 token is inherently backed by a satoshi, making sure a baseline value and integrating seamlessly with existing Bitcoin infrastructure.

testimonials.name: Shako
testimonials.text: The Atomicals protocol is a feature rich, Layer 1 (L1) protocol that aims to shape the future of DeFi and programmable digital objects on Bitcoin. This infographic aims to simplify the core features of the Atomicals Protocol⚛️
